name: Try To Not Die: Ludum Dare 46
name_original: Try To Not Die: Ludum Dare 46
description:
Try To Not Die : Ludum Dare 46

Use WS To move

Full Screen mode is better!

Keep your alien friend alive and if you get 50 Score, You will get a special scene

Screenshoot the scene if you got 50 score!!

Try to survive this game!!

Credits:

Tiles : https://rottingpixels.itch.io/nature-platformer-tileset
Character : https://friday-art.itch.io/simple-2d-characters

Music : DrKfir/My Self

Coding and Making the actuall game : DrKfir/My self
